DOC.criteria: 1 . Have ability understand sign write informed consent form , must obtain prior initiation study procedure . 2 . Must 18 55 year age , inclusive . 3 . Must nonsmoker . The use nicotine nicotinecontaining product must discontinue 90 day prior first dose study drug . 4 . Must calculate body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 29.9 kg/m2 . 5 . Must HIV1 antibody negative . 6 . Must hepatitis B ( HBV ) surface antigen negative . 7 . Must hepatitis C ( HCV ) antibody negative . 1 . Pregnant lactating subject . 2 . Have serious active medical psychiatric illness , opinion Investigator , would interfere subject treatment , assessment , compliance protocol . This would include renal , cardiac , hematologic , hepatic , pulmonary ( include chronic asthma ) , endocrine ( e.g. , diabetes ) , central peripheral nervous , gastrointestinal ( include ulcer ) , vascular , metabolic ( thyroid disorder , adrenal disease ) , immunodeficiency disorder , active infection , malignancy clinically significant require treatment . 3 . Have participate investigational trial involve administration investigational compound within 30 day prior study dose . 4 . Current alcohol substance abuse judge Investigator potentially interfere subject compliance . 5 . Have poor venous access unable donate blood . 6 . Have donate blood within 56 day study dose . 7 . Have donate plasma within 7 day study dose . 8 . Have take prescription medication overthecounter medication include herbal product within 28 day commence study drug dose exception vitamin and/or acetaminophen and/or ibuprofen and/or contraceptive medication .
